channel.title: P2p on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in P2p on Arrans github.io

item.title: rustdesk/rustdesk
item.description: An open-source remote desktop application designed for self-hosting, as an alternative to TeamViewer.

item.title: Chocobozzz/PeerTube
item.description: ActivityPub-federated video streaming platform using P2P directly in your web browser

item.title: anyproto/anytype-ts
item.description: Official Anytype client for MacOS, Linux, and Windows

item.title: streamich/json-joy
item.description: json-joy is a library that implements cutting-edge real-time and collaborative editing algorithms and utilities for JSON data models, with a focus on developing the JSON CRDT (Conflict-free Replicated Data Type) specification and implementation.

item.title: berty/berty
item.description: Berty is a secure peer-to-peer messaging app that works with or without internet access, cellular data or trust in the network

item.title: anyproto/any-sync
item.description: An open-source protocol enabling high-performance, local-first, peer-to-peer, end-to-end encrypted collaborative apps.

item.title: pablo-chacon/dede-protocol
item.description: DeDe Protocol, Neutral, Trustless Settlement Rails for P2P Crowdshipping
